ygData.subject: dual weild
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Bards and friends, Seeing that I m nearing lvl 17, i was curious about a few things really... 1) What is a good strategy to use while dual weilding? 2)
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Bards and friends,
Seeing that I'm nearing lvl 17, i was curious about a few things
really...

1) What is a good strategy to use while dual weilding?

2) I'm currently equipped with a PGT (dmg 6 del 24, berserker str proc wt 6)
and SBS (shield of course will go bye bye), and a Pugius Dagger (dmg 5 del
21 wt 2.?) which I use to hone my piercing skills after the PGT has already
proc'd. [BTW, i realize that proc means cast, but what does it stand for or
mean? =)] So will weilding both of these drain my stamina too quickly you
think?

3) And what are some good hot keys to have set up as I'm just learning the
skill?

4) When you auto attack, do both weapons go auto or must you continue to
click on some key or repeatedly type something?

5) What are some other good relatively inexpensive weapons to use for this?
Some ideas i have are Bladed Thulian Claws, Dragoon Dirk, and a 1h staff
possibly a Staff of Writhing. Those are still a little out of my price range
though; Dirk is not, but no one seems to ever want to let one go. =P Unless
they just ran across a Runed Bone Fork - in my dreams!!

Well I guess I can wait on some gift from the Gods or help from you
friendly wanderers of Norrath. My ears have turned to you folks (good choice
eh? lol)


Pava, Bard of measure 16
Silent Dragons
Cazic Thule
